text: The Hartberg District is a former district in the state of Styria in Austria. Hartberg merged with the district of Fürstenfeld to form the new district of Hartberg-Fürstenfeld on 1 January 2013. == Municipalities == Suburbs, hamlets and other subdivisions of a municipality are indicated in small characters. * Bad Waltersdorf ** Hohenbrugg, Leitersdorf, Lichtenwald, Wagerberg * Blaindorf ** Hofing, Illensdorf * Buch-Geiseldorf ** Geiseldorf, Oberbuch, Unterbuch, Unterdombach
